note.p: Career: Assistant to his father as Ordnance Storekeeper; Tower of London; Chief Clerk of the Stores, Ordnance Office; retired on a pension (1850); worked on explosives
Memberships: FSA; FCS (original member); Fellow of the Astronomical Society
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1869-1870 vol 18 pp iv-v
Notes: John Lee has signed election certificate twice
